software-engineer.title: Software Engineer Resume Template
software-engineer.content: Experienced software engineer with 5 years in Python, Java, and web development. Led team of 3 developers on e-commerce platform. Proficient in AWS, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines. Skills: Python, Java, JavaScript, React, Node.js, SQL, Git, Docker, AWS, Kubernetes.

data-analyst.title: Data Analyst Resume Template
data-analyst.content: Detail-oriented data analyst with 3 years experience in business intelligence. Skilled in SQL, Python, R, and Tableau. Created dashboards for executive team and automated reporting processes. Skills: SQL, Python, R, Tableau, Power BI, Excel, Statistics, Machine Learning.

marketing-specialist.title: Marketing Specialist Resume Template
marketing-specialist.content: Results-driven marketing specialist with 4 years experience in digital marketing. Managed social media campaigns and SEO initiatives for Fortune 500 companies. Increased engagement by 150%. Skills: Digital Marketing, SEO, SEM, Social Media, Content Creation, Analytics, Google Ads.
